column5: Well,after the last 2 days the older boy wanted a shot at one of these fish so after supper off we went.No sign of any pike this time and action was slow to start.He didn't want to get his shoes wet so thought it would be better to just wear his socks.  He was the first to catch a fish.   He was really rubbing it in until...   This pretty much shut him up,lol. Started getting dark after this so we left.   He has already challenged me for tomorrow so will have another report.
You better watch out tommrow for him, he might just pull that pike out. Good report. Looking forward to tommorow's daily report

nice report!... but where is his smile?? kinda freaking me out... do we have a mini Lew on our hands???? Paint his eyes red... Children of the corn!!!! Cant sleep tonight!!!!!!   LOL seriously though awesome report!! thanks for sharing!  Gerritt...

Haha Gerrit, thats pretty funny   I'm still jealous of your location in Paris - being able to walk from your place to 2 different rivers every night would cause me to cancel my TV subscription (well maybe not WFN).

I hear ya Tbayboy.I think I have been out everyday since you were down.I was really missing out by not taking a 5 minute walk. Yeah Xrap,I think I made him mad,lol and as far as his smile,it will be when he is holding the bigger fish
While I may not reply to all of them, I do enjoy your posts, it's good to see you getting out with your boys....and ya, it doesn't hurt that you're so close to the water  Maureen
yeah hes got that seriuos look.  From the looks of it that water doesn't look too deep. But its gotta be blast being so close to the water.   dsn
Great report  Its always cool to see kids with there father or mother out fishing,  My daughter used to come out all the time before she turned to the dark side (boys) lol  thanks again  Dave

Great report!  I think your son has a face of detemination!  Good going yet again...one day I'll be reading about a huge pike or another massive fish that you or your son pull out of there.  Great scenery shots...thanks!  Good luck today!
